name: Aiden Runs Super Fast!!!!!
description:
OMG IM RUNNING SO FAST HELP ME WIINNNNN

My Modifications:

1. I created a pseudo rhythm game, in which the character(to the best I could do) matches his jumps and movement to the beats in the song. For example, the track ends perfectly once you complete the level. Also, the falling section is during a steady staircase of notes that fall to a lower octave.

2. I modified the code so that I could accomplish a few things. For 1, I made it so that my character moves continuously without needing any input. Also, I made it so that the song can loop at the beginning of the level(This isn't a major mod, just something I thought I should mention).

3. I created the track for which my character runs to.

4. Now you may be wondering who that handsome devil is that is running? Well that's MEEEEEE!!!! I had a friend shutter shoot me doing the actions in the game, and used stop motion techniques to create animations for my character.

Created by Aiden Kalisz

Assets provided by MSU CAS 117.

Character animation and level music provided by Aiden Kalisz
